Need more info in order to do anything here.

Steps in I20070130-0800:
- new workspace
- switch quick diff team provider to CVS
- check out org.eclipse.jdt.junit4.runtime from CVS
- select META-INF/MANIFEST.MF in Package Explorer, context menu > Team > Show History
- context menu on rev. 1.5, choose Show Annotation, click Yes, click OK (bug 172301)
- close editor
- in History view, select rev. 1.4
- in History view, select rev. 1.5

=> NPE:
